game.name: Super World Adventure
game.description:
Have you played the popular Mario games earlier? If yes, we have got you covered with a brand new adventure challenge where you would find more fun and thrill that you experienced in this widely played platform game. Join Super World Adventure and be prepared to control a character who wants to reach his destination location in each level! Your ultimate character controlling and hand-eye coordination abilities will surely help you to complete all levels with the maximum score possible.

Do everything right from running, jumping and swimming in this HTML5 side-scrolling platformer! You would have 4 unique and challenging worlds to explore and 100 different levels to play through. Make sure to guide your hero to avoid traps, obstacles and kill enemies including enemy bosses. Do not forget to grab as much coins as you can on your way to boost your score. You can use those coins to purchase power-ups and upgrade characters. This interesting runner challenge will remind you of different old-school games.

Experience the soothing music and sounds, nice graphics, simple gameplay, multiple enemies and well-designed levels in this classic adventure platform game! Put your jumping and running abilities to the test to complete all 100 levels with three stars! Check out other popular titles from the category of jumping adventurer challenges and have a blast with your friends online, no download required! No chance of getting bored since we keep updating our website with new running games time to time! Good luck for a happy gaming experience!!
